1.content: In any case, the focus is not react navigation, but the possibility of writing your app once and running it on several different platforms.  Then you use the technology you want, for example for the interface, I choose @rn_paper

3.content:
What they say during code review:

"I see your point, but this is extra work - how about we create a ticket for it and get to it next sprint?"

What they mean:

"I literally don't give a single shit about it and this ticket will rot in the backlog for eternity"
3.name: Tomasz ≈Åakomy
